1315440.name: Battlefield 4™ Ground & Sea Vehicle Shortcut Kit
1315440.description:
With the Ground & Sea Vehicle Shortcut Kit, you get immediate access to upgrades that empower the offensive and defensive capabilities of ground and sea vehicles. Whether you’re new to Battlefield 4 or just want to make up for lost time, Shortcut Kits help you go toe-to-toe with Battlefield veterans by instantly unlocking powerful gear and bonuses that would otherwise be obtained through play.

Main Battle Tank upgrades. Want to strike fear in the hearts of your enemies and punch a massive hole in their defenses? Roll up on the battlefield in a heavily armored tank. This Shortcut Kit instantly unlocks all base-game upgrades for MBT vehicles.

Infantry Fighting Vehicle upgrades. Whenever you need to transport your squad across the battlefield, IFVs are the way to go. This Shortcut Kit instantly unlocks all base-game upgrades for IFV vehicles.

Mobile Anti-Aircraft upgrades. If your enemies decides to attack from the skies, hop in a MAA vehicle and take them out. This Shortcut Kit instantly unlocks all base-game upgrades for MAA vehicles.

Attack Boat upgrades. Swimming through a body of water won't do you much good when you're getting shot at from a hundred different directions. Take an attack boat instead. This Shortcut Kit instantly unlocks all base-game upgrades for attack boat vehicles.

Note: this Shortcut Kit does not include any gadgets or weapons added by expansion packs.
1315440.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 捷克语, 日语*, 韩语, 波兰语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 俄语*, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
